Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: IKM File to Teradata (TTU)
AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION Integration from a flat file staging area to Teradata using either using FastLoad, MultiLoad, TPump or Parallel Transporter. This KM executes the following steps: 1. Loads the data in the target table by using either fastload ,multiload, tpump or parallel transporter utility 2. Removes the temporary data files created (if specified with the DEL_TEMP_FILES option) Allows to use INSERT, UPSERT (default) or DELETE capabilities of MULTILOAD and TPUMP Utilities (specified by the MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE option) Additional information can be found in the Teradata Utilities Documentation. TTU scripts and logs are stored in the work directory of the source file
REQUIREMENTS The host of the ODI Agent running the job must have the Teradata Client Utilities installed (fastload ,multiload, tpump, tpt) An Update Key must be defined when using multiload and tpump UPSERT or DELETE mode.
BASIC CONFIGURATION - Make sure that the Data Server checkbox is checked in your Topology for the Teradata Technology and specify your Teradata server host in the Server field of your Data Server definition. To do that: 1. Edit the "Teradata" Technology definition in the Topology 2. Check the Naming Rules -> Using "Data Server" checkbox 3. Used Term : "Server" 4. Apply your changes 5. Edit your Teradata Dataserver definiton 6. In the Server field, enter the IP name of your Teradata Server (without "COPn") - Set the staging area to a different location than the target by selecting logical schema of the source file in the definition tab of the interface. - An Update Key must be defined when using multiload and tpump UPSERT or DELETE mode. - The fastload or multiload command scripts should be stored in a secured directory as they may contain passwords for the Teradata database. They can be deleted by the KM at the end of the job if the DEL_TEMP_FILES option is set to Yes. - The STATIC_CONTROL option call the Check Knowledge Module to isolate invalid data (if no CKM is set, an error occurs). This option must be set to NO in the case when an Integration Interface populates a TEMPORARY target datastore. - Info: When fastload utility is used, the KM will NOT DELETE all the data of the target table before calling the fastload utility for inserting the data of the generated file into the target table (use the option DELETE_ALL in order to do so). - In most of the cases, it is more efficient to use the "IKM Teradata Incremental Update" rather than this KM to perform Inserts and Updates. Both methods should be tested depending on your environment.
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - REPORT_NB_ROWS: List summary of load report in ODI log? - SESSIONS: Min and/or max number of Teradata load sessions to use - DEL_TEMP_FILES: Remove temp files after load? - STATIC_CONTROL: Run static control after loading of data? - PRIMARY_INDEX: Specify primary index to be used on flow/ target table - TERADATA_UTILITY: Which Teradata load utility to use? - MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS: specify Teradata ERRLIMIT - DELETE_ALL: Delete all from target before loading? - VALIDATE: Validate KM options? - CREATE_TARG_TABLE: Create target table? - MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE:insert, upsert or delete script for MLoad/ TPump - DROP_TTU_TABLES: Drop Teradata utility tables before load? - ODI_DDL: Specify, what DDL to be generated?
LIMITATIONS - FASTLOAD and TPT_LOAD do not allow any transformations, only straight mappings allowed. - Only a single source file per interface supported - Physical length of all source columns need to be set. - Fixed length files must not have any gaps between two columns. The end of col (n-1) needs to be directly followed by the beginning of col (n). - Only source data types String (includes Timestamps), Numeric and Date supported - Date and Timestamp formats need to be specified on source columns in ODI COL_FORMAT field. Please refer to Java Help for details on format syntax. E.g. "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss" for Timestamp. - Following date and timestamp format translations supported: Java Teradata Note "y" "Y" Year, supported: yyyy;yy => 1996;96 "M" "M" Month, supported: MMMM;MMM;MM => July;Jul;07 "DDD" "DDD" Day in year "dd" "DD" Day in month "a" "T" Am/pm marker "H" "H" Hour in day (0-23) "K" "H" Hour in day (0-11) "mm" "MI" Minute in hour "ss" "SS2 Second in minute "SSS" "S(F)" Millisecond in second "z" "Z" Timezone "Z" "Z" Timezone " " "B" Blank - Following numeric format translations supported: Java Teradata Note "0" "9" Digit "#" "Z" Digit, zero shows as absent "." "D" Decimal separator "-" "-" Minus sign "," "G" Grouping separator "E" "E" Separates mantissa & exponent in scientific notation " " "B" Blank - Following DataStore information is ignored: heading (not suported by neither FastLoad,MLoad,TPump nor TPT), record separator (automatically chosen by TTU), text delimiter (not supported by TTU), decimal separator (automatically chosen by TTU/SDF) - No source filters supported - The REPORT_NB_ROWS option generates a warning in the ODI Log. The error message of the task contains the report of the number of rows processed. - For more details on Teradata Data Types and their formats please see Teradata "SQL Reference: Data Types and Literals" - Some formats can only be read, if Teradata SDF (Specification for Data Formatting) are appropriately set

Specifies the character set encoding of the source file. If left blank, the TTU's default will be used.
Sample values: UTF8, UTF16, ASCII, EBCDIC, TCHBIG5_1R0
Please refer to Teradata: "Getting Started: International Character Sets and the Teradata Database" for more details.
Report the number of rows processed as an exception to the ODI Log (a task reporting the number of rows processed should appear as a warning in the log).

The following example specifies four FastLoad sessions: SESSION 4
The following example specifies ten FastLoad sessions with a minimum of five: SESSIONS 10 5
Uncheck this option if you want to keep the temporary fastload script after integration
Check this option to control the target table after having inserted or updated target data.
Check this option to control the target table after having inserted or updated target data.

Specify primary index for target table. Teradata uses the PI to spread data accross AMPs. It is important that the chosen PI has a high cardinality (many distint values) to ensure evenly spread data to allow maximum processing performance. Pleaes follow Teradata's recommandation on choosing a primary index, e.g. Teradata Database Design, Chapter "Primary Indexes" Valid options are [PK] Primary key of target table [UK] Update key set in interface <list of cols> This comma separated list of target columns defines the primary index. If no value is set (empty), no index will be created. NB: Teradata will automatically choose the first column of the table for the PI. [NOPI] Do not specify primary index for target table (Teradata 13.0 & above only).

Choose the teradata utility to load data choose: TPUMP to use tpump utility MLOAD to use multiload utility FASTLOAD to use fastload utility TPT-LOAD to use parallel transporter (load operator) TPT-SQL-INSERT to use parallel transporter (sql insert operator)
For details and appropriate choice of utility/ load operator, see Teradata documentation: TPUMP Teradata Parallel Data Pump Reference MLOAD Teradata MultiLoad Reference FASTLOAD Teradata FastLoad Reference TPT-LOAD Teradata Parallel Transporter Reference Teradata Parallel Transporter User Guide TPT-SQL-INSERT Teradata Parallel Transporter Reference Teradata Parallel Transporter User Guide

Maximum number of tolerated errors. This corresponds to - ERRLIMIT command in FastLoad, MultiLoad and TPump - ErrorLimit attribute in TPT Load operator Note: TPT SQL Insert operator does not support any error limit. This option is ignored for TPT-SQL-INSERT.
Check this option if you wish to delete all the rows of the target datastore.

This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - Validation of TERADATA_UTILITY option - Validation of MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE option - Validation of ODI_DDL option - Is physical length information set for all source columns?
This option should be turned off for all production use in particular for high-frequency execution. There is not added value in production, only processing overhead.
Check this option if you wish to create the target table.

Operation performed by load utility (only for MULTILOAD and TPUMP)
choose: INSERT (insert new data) UPSERT (insert new data and update exising) DELETE (delete existing data)
WARNING: using fasload forces the KM to delete the content of the target table before fastloading the data in it.

This option is intended for development use only. Do NOT use in production!
If activated, drops all Teradata utility tables like - acquisition error table - application error table - log table - work table

Specify handling of temporary tables with the following values: - DROP_CREATE: Always drop and recreate all temporary tables for every execution (default behaviour). - CREATE_DELETE_ALL: Create temporary tables when needed (usually for the first execution only) and use DELETE ALL to drop the temporary table content. Temporary table are reused for subsequent executions. - DELETE_ALL: Do not create temporary tables. Only submit DELETE ALL for all temporary tables. - NONE: Do not issue any DDL on temporary tables. Temporary tables should be handled separately.

# Checking for valid value for TERADATA_UTILITY... <? if ( !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" )%>".equals( "FASTLOAD" ) && !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" )%>".equals( "MLOAD" ) && !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" )%>".equals( "TPUMP" ) && !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" )%>".equals( "TPT-LOAD" ) && !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" )%>".equals( "TPT-SQL-INSERT" ) ) { ?> raise OdiKMException("ODIKM-STDKM-10000", "ODIKM-STDKM-10000: Invalid value \"{0}\" for option \"TERADATA_UTILITY\"",["<%=odiRef.getOption ("TERADATA_UTILITY")%>"]) <?} else { ?># => OK, '<%=odiRef.getOption( "TERADATA_UTILITY" )%>' is a valid value for TERADATA_UTILITY. <? }; ?> # Checking for valid value for MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE... <? if ( !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE" )%>".equals( "INSERT" ) && !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE" )%>".equals( "UPSERT" ) && !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE" )%>".equals( "DELETE" ) ) { ?> raise OdiKMException("ODIKM-STDKM-10000", "ODIKM-STDKM-10000: Invalid value \"{0}\" for option \"MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE\"",["<%=odiRef.getOption ("MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE")%>"]) <?} else { ?># => OK, '<%=odiRef.getOption( "MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE" )%>' is a valid value for MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE. <? }; ?> # Checking for valid value for ODI_DDL... <? if ( !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" )%>".equals( "DROP_CREATE" ) && !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" )%>".equals( "CREATE_DELETE_ALL" ) && !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" )%>".equals( "DELETE_ALL" ) && !"<%=odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" )%>".equals( "NONE" ) ) { ?> raise OdiKMException("ODIKM-STDKM-10000", "ODIKM-STDKM-10000: Invalid value \"{0}\" for option \"ODI_DDL\"",["<%=odiRef.getOption ("ODI_DDL")%>"]) <?} else { ?># => OK, '<%=odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" )%>' is a valid value for ODI_DDL. <? }; ?> # Checking for missing physical length information... <%= odiRef.getSrcColList("<? if (", "\u0022[BYTES]\u0022.length()==0", "\u0022[BYTES]\u0022.length()==0", " || ", ") { ?>") %> raise OdiKMException("ODIKM-FILE-10008", "ODIKM-FILE-10008: Some source columns do not have physical length information defined. Please set physical length for all columns.") <?} else { ?># => OK, physical length information specified for all source columns <? }; ?>#

<% if (odiRef.getOption( "ODI_DDL" ).indexOf( "CREATE" )>-1) { %>

create <% if (!odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[NOPI]")) 
          out.print( "set " );
%>table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%>
(
	<%=odiRef.getTargetColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT]", ",\n\t", "")%>
)
<% /* use update key for PI ? */
      if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[UK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("primary index (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "UK") );
      /* use primary key for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[PK]")) 
          out.print( odiRef.getColList("unique primary index (", "[COL_NAME]", ",", ")", "PK") );
      /* No PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").equals("[NOPI]")) 
          out.print( " no primary index " );
      /* use column list for PI ? */
      else if (odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX").length() > 0) 
          out.print( "primary index (" + odiRef.getOption("PRIMARY_INDEX") + ")" );
%>

<%} else {%>
-- Disabled by ODI_DDL option
<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("MLOAD")) {%> release mload <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> <%} else {%> -- Only needed for MLOAD <%};%>

<?

package com.oracle.odi.ext;

public class FormatTranslator {
    // Java Number Formatting information available at http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/text/DecimalFormat.html
    // Java Date Formatting information available at http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/text/SimpleDateFormat.html
    // Teradata Number Formatting information available in Teradata SQL Reference: Chapter "Output Format Phrases": FORMAT phrases and NUMERIC formats
    // Teradata Date Formatting information available in Teradata SQL Reference: Chapter "Output Format Phrases": FORMAT phrases and DateTime formats
    
    static String[][] transTableDate = {
        {"y",        "Y"},    // Year, supported:  yyyy;yy => 1996;96
        {"M",        "M"},    // Month, supported: MMMM;MMM;MM => July;Jul;07
        {"DDD",        "DDD"},    // Day in year
        {"dd",        "DD"},    // Day in month
        {"a",        "T"},    // Am/pm marker
        {"H",        "H"},    // Hour in day (0-23)
        {"K",        "H"},    // Hour in day (0-11)
        {"mm",        "MI"},    // Minute in hour
        {"ss",        "SS"},    // Second in minute
        {"SSS",        "S(F)"},// Millisecond in second
        {"z",        "Z"},    // Timezone
        {"Z",        "Z"},    // Timezone
        {" ",        "B"}    // Blank
    };
    
    static String[][] transTableNumber = {
        {"0",    "9"},    // Digit
        {"#",    "Z"},     // Digit, zero shows as absent
        {"\\.",    "D"},    // Decimal separator
        {"-",    "-"},    // Minus sign
        {",",    "G"},    // Grouping separator
        {"E",    "E"},    // Separates mantissa and exponent in scientific notation                
        {" ",    "B"}    // Blank
    };
       

    public static String translate(String begin, String srcDT, String colFormat, String end, String alt) throws Exception {
    // Translate the java data type format in colFormat into Teradata data type format
    // If Teradata data type formatting is needed, colFormat is prefixed by begin and suffixed by end.
    // If not, alt is returned.
        String format = "";
        
        if (colFormat.trim().length()==0)
            /* we use Teradata's default format */
            format = "";
        else {
            // Is source column a date?
            if ( srcDT.toUpperCase().equals( "DATE") ) {
                format = colFormat;
                for (int i = 0; i < transTableDate.length; i++)
                    format = format.replaceAll( transTableDate[i][0], transTableDate[i][1] );
            } else
            // Is source column a numeric?
            if ( srcDT.toUpperCase().equals( "NUMERIC")) {
                format = colFormat;
                for (int i = 0; i < transTableNumber.length; i++)
                    format = format.replaceAll( transTableNumber[i][0], transTableNumber[i][1] );
            } else
            // Is source column anything else than a string?
            if ( !srcDT.toUpperCase().equals( "STRING" ))
                throw new OdiKMException("ODIKM-FILE-10007", "ODIKM-FILE-10007: No format translation defined for data type {0}", new Object[] {srcDT} );
        };
        if ( format.length() > 0 )
            format = begin + format + end;
        else
            format = alt;
        return format;
    }

    public static String translate(String begin, String srcDT, String colFormat, String end) throws Exception {
        return translate(begin, srcDT, colFormat, end, "");
    }

}

// for testing:
//out.print( FormatTranslator.translate("Numeric", "-#,###.##E -000" ));


public class colExprReplacer {
    // Allows replacing all references to a source field by a new expression

    Properties ps = new Properties();
     
    public void addColumn(String search, String replace) {
    // Add translation for a source field
        // We want to find the reference only, if it starts and ends on a word boundary. So we add \b:
        ps.setProperty("\b"+search+"\b",replace);
    }

    public String replace(String inputString) {
    // Replace all references to source fields by registered expresssion
        String outputString = inputString;
        String curCol = "";
        for (Enumeration e = ps.propertyNames(); e.hasMoreElements();) {
            curCol = (String)e.nextElement();
            outputString = outputString.replaceAll(curCol,ps.getProperty(curCol));
        };
        return outputString;
    }

}

?>SnpsOutFile "-File=<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[WORK_SCHEMA]/[TABLE_NAME]", "", "")%>.script"
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("FASTLOAD")) {

/********************************************************************************/
/* FastLoad Script                 */
/********************************************************************************/ %>

SESSIONS <%=odiRef.getOption("SESSIONS")%>;
<% if (!odiRef.getOption("FILE_CHARSET").equals("")) {%>SET SESSION CHARSET '<%=odiRef.getOption("FILE_CHARSET")%>' ;<%};%>
<% if ((new java.lang.Integer(odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS"))).longValue()>0) {%>ERRLIMIT <%=odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS")%>;<%}; %>
LOGON <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>/<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>,<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>;

BEGIN LOADING <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>
    ERRORFILES <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ET_" + odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME"), "W") %>, <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "UV_" + odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME"), "W") %>;

<%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {%>

SET RECORD TEXT;
DEFINE
<%=odiRef.getSrcColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]\t(char([BYTES]))", "\t[COL_NAME]\t(char([BYTES]))", ",\n", "")%>
<%} else {%>

SET RECORD VARTEXT "<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SFILE_SEP_FIELD]", "", "")%>";
DEFINE
<%=odiRef.getSrcColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]\t(varchar([BYTES]))", "\t[COL_NAME]\t(varchar([BYTES]))", ",\n", "")%>
<%}%>
FILE=<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SCHEMA]/[RES_NAME]", "", "")%>;

<? // Initialize source column translation
    cer = new colExprReplacer();?>
<%=odiRef.getSrcColList("<? ",
    "cer.addColumn("+
        "\u0022"+odiRef.getSrcTablesList("[POP_TAB_ALIAS]","")+".[COL_NAME]\u0022,"+
        "\u0022:[COL_NAME] \u0022 +FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022(format '\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022')\u0022)"+
    " );",
    "cer.addColumn("+
        "\u0022"+odiRef.getSrcTablesList("[POP_TAB_ALIAS]","")+".[COL_NAME]\u0022,"+
        "\u0022:[COL_NAME] \u0022 +FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022(format '\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022')\u0022)"+
    " );",
    "\n", " ?>")
%>

INSERT INTO <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>
(
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]", ",\n", "","")%>
)
VALUES (
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022)?>"
    , ",\n","","")%>
);

END LOADING;

LOGOFF;
<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("MLOAD")) {

/********************************************************************************/
/* MLoad Script                 */
/********************************************************************************/ %>


.LOGTABLE <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "LOG_" + odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME"), "W") %>;

.LOGON <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>/<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>,<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>;

.BEGIN IMPORT MLOAD tables <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>
    WORKTABLES <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "WT_" + odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME"), "W") %>
    ERRORTABLES <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ET_" + odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME"), "W") %> <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "UV_" + odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME"), "W") %>
    SESSIONS <%=odiRef.getOption("SESSIONS")%>
    <% if ((new java.lang.Integer(odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS"))).longValue()>0) {%>ERRLIMIT <%=odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS")%><%}; %>;


.LAYOUT OdiCurrentLayout;
<%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {
    out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * char([BYTES]);", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * char([BYTES]);", "\n", "") );
} else {
    out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * varchar([BYTES]);", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * varchar([BYTES]);", "\n", "") );
};%>


<? // Initialize source column translation
    cer = new colExprReplacer();?>
<%=odiRef.getSrcColList("<? ",
    "cer.addColumn("+
        "\u0022"+odiRef.getSrcTablesList("[POP_TAB_ALIAS]","")+".[COL_NAME]\u0022,"+
        "FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022cast(:[COL_NAME] as [DEST_DT] format '\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022')\u0022, \u0022:[COL_NAME] \u0022)"+
    " );",
    "cer.addColumn("+
        "\u0022"+odiRef.getSrcTablesList("[POP_TAB_ALIAS]","")+".[COL_NAME]\u0022,"+
        "FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022cast(:[COL_NAME] as [DEST_DT] format '\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022')\u0022, \u0022:[COL_NAME] \u0022)"+
    " );",
    "\n", " ?>")
%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE").equals("INSERT")) {%>

.DML LABEL OdiAction;
INSERT INTO <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>
(
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]", ",\n", "","INS and REW")%>
)
VALUES (
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022)?>"
    , ",\n","","INS and REW")%>
);

<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE").equals("UPSERT")) {%>

.DML LABEL OdiAction
Do insert for missing update rows;

UPDATE <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%> SET
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] =\t<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022)?>"
    , ",\n","","((UPD and !UK) and REW)")%>
WHERE
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] =\t<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022)?>"
    , " AND \n","","(UK and REW)")%>;

INSERT INTO <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>
(
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]", ",\n", "","INS and REW")%>
)
VALUES (
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022)?>"
    , ",\n","","INS and REW")%>
);
<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE").equals("DELETE")) {%>

.DML LABEL OdiAction;
DELETE FROM <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>
WHERE
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] =\t<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022)?>"
    , ",\n","","(UK and REW)")%>;

<%}%>


.IMPORT INFILE '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SCHEMA]/[RES_NAME]", "", "")%>'
    <%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {
    %>FORMAT TEXT<%} else {
    %>FORMAT VARTEXT '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SFILE_SEP_FIELD]", "", "")%>' NOSTOP<%};%>
    LAYOUT OdiCurrentLayout
    APPLY OdiAction;

.END MLOAD;

.LOGOFF;
<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("TPUMP")) {

/********************************************************************************/
/* TPump Script                 */
/********************************************************************************/ %>


.LOGTABLE <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "LOG_" + odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME"), "W") %>;

.LOGON <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>/<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>,<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>;

.BEGIN LOAD
    SESSIONS <%=odiRef.getOption("SESSIONS")%>
    ERRORTABLE <%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ET_" + odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME"), "W") %>
    SERIALIZE OFF
    <% if ((new java.lang.Integer(odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS"))).longValue()>0) {%>ERRLIMIT <%=odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS")%><%}; %>;


.LAYOUT OdiCurrentLayout;
<%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {
    out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * char([BYTES]);", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * char([BYTES]);", "\n", "") );
} else {
    out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * varchar([BYTES]);", ".FIELD\t[COL_NAME] * varchar([BYTES]);", "\n", "") );
};%>


<? // Initialize source column translation
    cer = new colExprReplacer();?>
<%=odiRef.getSrcColList("<? ",
    "cer.addColumn("+
        "\u0022"+odiRef.getSrcTablesList("[POP_TAB_ALIAS]","")+".[COL_NAME]\u0022,"+
        "FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022cast(:[COL_NAME] as [DEST_DT] format '\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022')\u0022, \u0022:[COL_NAME] \u0022)"+
    " );",
    "cer.addColumn("+
        "\u0022"+odiRef.getSrcTablesList("[POP_TAB_ALIAS]","")+".[COL_NAME]\u0022,"+
        "FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022cast(:[COL_NAME] as [DEST_DT] format '\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022')\u0022, \u0022:[COL_NAME] \u0022)"+
    " );",
    "\n", " ?>")
%>


<% if (odiRef.getOption("MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE").equals("INSERT")) {%>

.DML LABEL OdiAction ;
INSERT INTO <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>
(
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]", ",\n", "","INS and REW")%>
)
VALUES (
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022)?>"
    , ",\n","","INS and REW")%>
);

<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE").equals("UPSERT")) {%>

.DML LABEL OdiAction
Do insert for missing update rows;

UPDATE <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%> SET
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] =\t<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022)?>"
    , ",\n","","((UPD and !UK) and REW)")%>
WHERE
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] =\t<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022)?>"
    , " AND \n","","(UK and REW)")%>;

INSERT INTO <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>
(
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]", ",\n", "","INS and REW")%>
)
VALUES (
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022)?>"
    , ",\n","","INS and REW")%>
);

<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("MULTILOAD_TPUMP_TYPE").equals("DELETE")) {%>

.DML LABEL OdiAction;
DELETE FROM <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>
WHERE
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] =\t<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022)?>"
    , ",\n","","(UK and REW)")%>;

<%}%>


.IMPORT INFILE '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SCHEMA]/[RES_NAME]", "", "")%>'
    <%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {
    %>FORMAT TEXT<%} else {
    %>FORMAT VARTEXT '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SFILE_SEP_FIELD]", "", "")%>' NOSTOP<%};%>
    LAYOUT OdiCurrentLayout
    APPLY OdiAction;
.END LOAD;
.LOGOFF;
<%}%>
<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").startsWith("TPT")) {

/********************************************************************************/
/* Parallel Transporter Script                 */
/********************************************************************************/ %>


<% if (!odiRef.getOption("FILE_CHARSET").equals("")) {%>USING CHARACTER SET <%=odiRef.getOption("FILE_CHARSET")%><%};%>
DEFINE JOB "ODILoad<%=odiRef.getStep("SESS_GUID")%>"
DESCRIPTION 'ODI step name: <%=odiRef.getStep("STEP_NAME")%> ODI step #:<%=odiRef.getStep("NNO")%> from session #<%=odiRef.getStep("SESS_GUID")%>'
(
DEFINE SCHEMA TargetTable
DESCRIPTION 'Target table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>'
(
<%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] "+ odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL"),  ",\n", "","")%>
);

DEFINE SCHEMA SourceFile
DESCRIPTION 'Source file for <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>'
(
<%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {
    out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] char([BYTES])", "\t[COL_NAME] char([BYTES])", ",\n", "") );
} else {
    out.print( odiRef.getSrcColList("", "\t[COL_NAME] varchar([BYTES])", "\t[COL_NAME] varchar([BYTES])", ",\n", "") );
};%>
);

DEFINE OPERATOR FileReader
DESCRIPTION 'Read File Using DataConnector'
TYPE DATACONNECTOR PRODUCER
SCHEMA SourceFile
ATTRIBUTES
(
    VARCHAR PrivateLogName,
    VARCHAR AccessModuleName,
    VARCHAR AccessModuleInitStr,
    VARCHAR DirectoryPath = '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SCHEMA]/", "", "")%>',
    VARCHAR FileName = '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[RES_NAME]", "", "")%>', /*Name of the file read from or written to*/
    VARCHAR OpenMode = 'Read', /*How to open the file: read, write, or writeappend*/
    <%if (odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[FILE_FORMAT]", "", "").equals("F")) {
    %>VARCHAR Format = 'text', /*Teradata file formats used (binary, delimited, formatted, unformatted or text)*/<% } else {
    %>VARCHAR Format = 'delimited', /*Teradata file formats used (binary, delimited, formatted, unformatted or text)*/
    VARCHAR TextDelimiter = '<%=odiRef.getSrcTablesList("", "[SFILE_SEP_FIELD]", "", "")%>',<% } %>
    VARCHAR IndicatorMode = 'N', /*Whether indicator bytes are used in the operation*/
    INTEGER RowsPerInstance,
    INTEGER VigilWaitTime,
    VARCHAR VigilStartTime,
    VARCHAR VigilStopTime,
    VARCHAR VigilNoticeFileName,
    VARCHAR TraceLevel = 'none'
);

<% if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("TPT-LOAD")) { %>
DEFINE OPERATOR LoadTargetTable
TYPE LOAD
SCHEMA *
ATTRIBUTES
(
    INTEGER MaxSessions = <%=odiRef.getOption("SESSIONS")%>,
    <% if ((new java.lang.Integer(odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS"))).longValue()>0) {%>INTEGER ErrorLimit = <%=odiRef.getOption("MAX_ALLOWED_ERRORS")%>,<%}; %>
    VARCHAR UserName = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>',
    VARCHAR UserPassword = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>',
    VARCHAR LogTable = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "LOG_" + odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME"), "W") %>',
    VARCHAR TargetTable = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>',
    VARCHAR ErrorTable1 = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ET_" + odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME"), "W") %>',
    VARCHAR ErrorTable2 = '<%=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "UV_" + odiRef.getTargetTable("RES_NAME"), "W") %>',
    VARCHAR PauseAcq,
    VARCHAR PrivateLogName,
    VARCHAR TdpId ='<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>'
);

<? // Initialize source column translation for *** Load Operator ***
    cer = new colExprReplacer();?>
<%=odiRef.getSrcColList("<? ",
    "cer.addColumn("+
        "\u0022"+odiRef.getSrcTablesList("[POP_TAB_ALIAS]","")+".[COL_NAME]\u0022,"+
        "\u0022:[COL_NAME]\u0022 + FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022 (format ''\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022'')\u0022)"+
    " );",
    "cer.addColumn("+
        "\u0022"+odiRef.getSrcTablesList("[POP_TAB_ALIAS]","")+".[COL_NAME]\u0022,"+
        "\u0022:[COL_NAME]\u0022 + FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022 (format ''\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022'')\u0022)"+
    " );",
    "\n", " ?>")
%>

<% }; if (odiRef.getOption("TERADATA_UTILITY").equals("TPT-SQL-INSERT")) { %>
DEFINE OPERATOR LoadTargetTable
TYPE INSERTER
SCHEMA *
ATTRIBUTES
(
    VARCHAR UserName = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>',
    VARCHAR UserPassword ='<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_PASS")%>',
    VARCHAR PrivateLogName,
    VARCHAR TdpId ='<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DSERV_NAME")%>'
);

<? // Initialize source column translation for *** SQL-INSERT *** Operator
    cer = new colExprReplacer();?>
<%=odiRef.getSrcColList("<? ",
    "cer.addColumn("+
        "\u0022"+odiRef.getSrcTablesList("[POP_TAB_ALIAS]","")+".[COL_NAME]\u0022,"+
        "FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022cast(:[COL_NAME] as [DEST_DT] format ''\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022'')\u0022, \u0022:[COL_NAME] \u0022)"+
    " );",
    "cer.addColumn("+
        "\u0022"+odiRef.getSrcTablesList("[POP_TAB_ALIAS]","")+".[COL_NAME]\u0022,"+
        "FormatTranslator.translate(\u0022cast(:[COL_NAME] as [DEST_DT] format ''\u0022, \u0022[SOURCE_DT]\u0022, \u0022[COL_FORMAT]\u0022, \u0022'')\u0022, \u0022:[COL_NAME] \u0022)"+
    " );",
    "\n", " ?>")
%>

<%}%>

APPLY
(
    'INSERT INTO <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "D")%>
    (
    <%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "","")%>
    )
    VALUES
    (
        <%=odiRef.getColList("", "<?=cer.replace(\u0022[EXPRESSION]\u0022.replaceAll(\u0022'\u0022,\u0022''\u0022))?>"
        , ",\n\t\t","","")%>
    );'
)
TO OPERATOR
(
    LoadTargetTable[1]
)
    SELECT
    <%=odiRef.getSrcColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]", "\t[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "")%>
    FROM OPERATOR(FileReader[1]);
);


<%}%>
DEMO.IKM File to Teradata (TTU).Validate KM options
DEMO.IKM File to Teradata (TTU).Create target table
DEMO.IKM File to Teradata (TTU).Release mload lock
DEMO.IKM File to Teradata (TTU).Drop TTU work table
DEMO.IKM File to Teradata (TTU).Drop TTU log table
DEMO.IKM File to Teradata (TTU).Drop error table 1
DEMO.IKM File to Teradata (TTU).Report number of rows
DEMO.IKM File to Teradata (TTU).Delete temporary files
DEMO.IKM File to Teradata (TTU).Drop error table 2
DEMO.IKM File to Teradata (TTU).Delete target table
